citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15 am on
10-Jul-17.
The inspector knocked on the door and called the numbers provided. The inspector spoke with the licensees over
the phone, who indicated they were out of town and would not be able to return to the facility within a reasonable
length of time.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15 am on
10-Jul-17.
The inspector knocked on the door and called the numbers provided.  The inspector spoke with the licensees over
the phone, who indicated they were out of town and would not be able to return to the facility within a reasonable
length of time.
